issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
/ui/common/baseui/mapview.js uses an iOS-specific Toolbar so that there are no buttons for map controls on Android. The sample should enable the user to select map type (satellite, hybrid, etc.), change map location, and so forth. These need to be implemented as an Android menu or as standard buttons to be cross-platform. 

Sample as written currently will likely also fail on MobileWeb.
fields.summary: KitchenSink: Map view demo uses iOS-specific controls so that Android has no buttons for options
fields.environment: KitchenSink 2.1.1.GA pulled from the Developer Relations repo on 1 Oct 2012

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
